# # Loading data ------------------------------------------------------------

CBT_report <- read_excel(paste0(CBT_location, "MASTER_DATABASE_CBT.xlsx"))
  
date_variabes <- CBT_report %>% select(matches("_date")) %>% colnames() 
date_variabes <- c(date_variabes, "DOB")
CBT_report[date_variabes] <- lapply(CBT_report[date_variabes], as.Date) 

numeric_variables <- CBT_report %>% select(matches("_tot")) %>% colnames() 
CBT_report[numeric_variables] <- lapply(CBT_report[numeric_variables], as.numeric)
CBT_report[numeric_variables] <- lapply(CBT_report[numeric_variables], round)
                                                
# because there are 2 versions of the MFQ and ARI, coalescing these to fill in missing data: 
CBT_report$p_mfq1w_tot <- coalesce(CBT_report$p_mfq1w_tot, CBT_report$p_mfq_tot)
CBT_report$s_mfq1w_tot <- coalesce(CBT_report$s_mfq1w_tot, CBT_report$s_mfq_tot)
CBT_report$p_ari1w_tot <- coalesce(CBT_report$p_ari1w_tot, CBT_report$p_ari6m_tot)
CBT_report$s_ari1w_tot <- coalesce(CBT_report$s_ari1w_tot, CBT_report$s_ari6m_tot)

CBT_report <- CBT_report %>% select(-matches("_ari6m_"), -matches("_mfq_"))

# if you want to check that the variable types have been successfully transformed: 
# str(CBT_report, list.len=ncol(CBT_report))

# Patient specific data ------------------------------------------------------------

data <- CBT_report %>% filter(Initials==Participant)

# changing date formats
data$Clinical_Visit_Date2 <- format(data$Clinical_Visit_Date, "%B-%d")
data$Clinical_Visit_Date3 <- format(data$Clinical_Visit_Date, "%B-%d-%Y")
data$Clinical_Visit_Date4 <- factor(data$Clinical_Visit_Number, levels=data$Clinical_Visit_Number, labels=data$Clinical_Visit_Date2)
todays_date <- todays_date_formatted %>% format(., "%B %d %Y")

# fixing name case
f_name <- head(data$FIRST_NAME,1)
l_name <- head(data$LAST_NAME,1)
f_name <- paste(substring(f_name, 1, 1), tolower(substring(f_name, 2)), sep = "", collapse = " ")
l_name <- paste(substring(l_name, 1, 1), tolower(substring(l_name, 2)), sep = "", collapse = " ")

# parent name

p_f_name <- head(data$FIRST_NAME_P1,1,)
p_l_name <- head(data$LAST_NAME_P1,1)
p_f_name <- paste(substring(p_f_name, 1, 1), tolower(substring(p_f_name, 2)), sep = "", collapse = " ")
p_l_name <- paste(substring(p_l_name, 1, 1), tolower(substring(p_l_name, 2)), sep = "", collapse = " ")

# treatment related 
start <- data %>% arrange(Clinical_Visit_Number) %>% slice(1) %>% select(Clinical_Visit_Date) %>% pull() %>% as.Date() %>% format(., "%B-%d")
end <- data %>% arrange(Clinical_Visit_Number) %>% slice(n()) %>% select(Clinical_Visit_Date) %>% pull() %>% as.Date() %>% format(., "%B-%d")
weeks_treat  <- data %>% arrange(Clinical_Visit_Number) %>% slice(n()) %>% select(Clinical_Visit_Number) %>% pull()

# provider <- head(data$Primary_clinician,1)
provider <- c("INSERT COMMUNITY PROVIDER")

# basic demographics 
gender <- head(data$SEX,1) %>% tolower()
datebirth <- as.Date(head(data$DOB,1))
age <- age_calc(dob = datebirth, enddate = todays_date_formatted, units = "years", precise = TRUE) %>% round(., digits = 1) 
datebirth <- format(datebirth, "%B-%d-%Y")
dx <- head(data$c_ksadsdx_primary_dx,1)
dx <- gsub("MDD", "Major Depressive Disorder", dx, fixed=TRUE)

if (head(data$SEX,1)=="FEMALE") {
  pronoun <- c("her")
} else {pronoun <- c("his")}

# Setting Clinician ------------------------------------------------------------

if (Clinician=="Kathryn") {
  treating_clinician = "Kathryn DeLonga"
  clinician_cred = "Psy.D"
  clinician_position = "Licensed Clinical Psychologist, Director of Psychological Treatment"
  clinician_location = "Mood Brain & Development Unit"
  clinician_contact = "301-827-1168"
} else if (Clinician=="Ken") {
  treating_clinician = "Kenneth E. Towbin"
  clinician_cred = "MD"

} else if (Clinician=="Argyris") {

  clinician_cred = "MD, PhD, FRCPsych"
  clinician_position = "Chief and Principal Investigator"
  clinician_location = "Mood Brain & Development Unit"
  clinician_contact = "301-443-8019"
} else if (Clinician=="Chana") {
  treating_clinician = "Chana Engel"
  clinician_cred = "CRNP"
  clinician_position = "Treating Clinician"
  clinician_location = "Mood Brain & Development Unit"

} else {

  clinician_position = "Treating Clinician"

}

This letter is the summary of your patient’s course of treatment and treatment response in this program.

The goal of the program is to help the adolescent stop the cycle of depression by identifying triggers related to sad feelings or loss of motivation, learn skills and strategies to overcome depression, and set goals to make life more fulfilling through guided activity. Additionally, parents learn new ways to communicate and support the adolescent.

#### Patient self-report score summary

During `r pronoun` treatment, we monitored `r f_name`'s symptoms through weekly self-report questionnaires, each summarized below. 

*** 

##### Depressive symptoms

MFQ (Mood & Feelings Questionnaire): 13 items rated 0-2, clinical cutoff score = 12.

```{r echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}

data %>% filter(!is.na(s_mfq1w_tot) | !is.na(p_f_mfq1w_tot) | !is.na(p_m_mfq1w_tot) | !is.na(p_u_mfq1w_tot)) %>% filter(Clinical_Visit_Number != '0') %>% 
  gather(Measure, value, s_mfq1w_tot, p_f_mfq1w_tot, p_m_mfq1w_tot, p_u_mfq1w_tot) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=Clinical_Visit_Date4, y=value, group=Measure), na.rm = TRUE) +
  geom_point(aes(shape=Measure, group=Measure), size=3) +
  geom_line() +
  geom_text(aes(label=value), hjust=0, vjust=-1) +
  labs(title="Depressive symptoms\n", x="\nCBT Visit Date", y="Depression Score\n") +
  ylim(0,27) + 
  scale_shape_manual(labels = c("Father", "Mother", "Parent", "Child"), values=c(17, 16, 3, 5)) +
  theme_minimal() +
  guides(shape=guide_legend("Person reporting:")) 

```

***

```{r echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}

data %>% filter(!is.na(s_mfq1w_tot) | !is.na(p_f_mfq1w_tot) | !is.na(p_m_mfq1w_tot) | !is.na(p_u_mfq1w_tot)) %>%  filter(Clinical_Visit_Number != '0') %>% 
  arrange(Clinical_Visit_Number) %>% select(Clinical_Visit_Date3, Clinical_Visit_Number, s_mfq1w_tot, p_f_mfq1w_tot, p_m_mfq1w_tot, p_u_mfq1w_tot) %>% 
  mutate(s_mfq1w_tot = replace_na(s_mfq1w_tot, " ")) %>% mutate(p_f_mfq1w_tot = replace_na(p_f_mfq1w_tot, " ")) %>% mutate(p_m_mfq1w_tot = replace_na(p_m_mfq1w_tot, " ")) %>% mutate(p_u_mfq1w_tot = replace_na(p_u_mfq1w_tot, " ")) %>% 
  kable(., col.names = c("Visit Date", "Visit Number", "Child MFQ", "Father MFQ", "Mother MFQ", "Parent MFQ: not recorded"))

```

#### Alternative measures of depression: 

##### Parent and child consensus on depression symptoms 

CDRS (Children's Depression Rating Scale): 20 items. Each question is asked of both parent and child and then a consensus score reached by the clinician. Items range between 1-5 and 1-7, depending on the question.

```{r echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}

data %>% filter(!is.na(c_cdrs_tot)) %>% gather(Measure, value, c_cdrs_tot) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=Clinical_Visit_Date4, y=value, group=Measure), na.rm = TRUE) +

  geom_line() +
  geom_text(aes(label=value), hjust=0, vjust=-1) +
  labs(title="Depression symptoms\n", x="\nCBT Visit Date", y="CDRS Total\n") + 
  ylim(0,125) +

```
